name: Survive both sides
description:
survive both sides a new hyper casual game,try to control the player between sides through different obstacles scoring a high score ,Be careful to not hit the obstacles or the spikes. Time your actions.

My first game using unity i am glad to do it and release it for you just enjoy playing 

Collect as many gems as possible and unlock new characters, you'll be enjoying using them.

Can you beat all the obstacles? achieve the highest score?
